sentences.english: Ambition is a drug that makes its addicts potential madmen.
sentences.chinese: 野心是一種毒品，它會使那些有瘋癲潛質的人上癮。

sentences.english: She was out of her head to go swimming in this freezing weather.
sentences.chinese: 她瘋瘋癲癲的，這麼寒冷的天氣還跑去游泳。

sentences.english: And then you are gaga and can't see things right.
sentences.chinese: 於是你瘋癲，不能正確的看待事情。

sentences.english: How can one haunted by madness be joyful?
sentences.chinese: 一個飽受瘋癲折磨人如何才能喜悅？

sentences.english: There's a strain of madness in the family.
sentences.chinese: 那一家人都有點瘋瘋癲癲的。

sentences.english: But he was certainly a little bit mad .
sentences.chinese: 可是他的確也有點兒瘋瘋癲癲。

sentences.english: Am I so short of madmen that you have to bring this fellow here to carry on like this in front of me?
sentences.chinese: 我豈缺少瘋子，你們帶這人來在我面前瘋癲嗎？

sentences.english: Is talking to yourself a sign of madness?
sentences.chinese: 自言自語是否是瘋癲的一種表現？

sentences.english: Repeated every day, going gaga mouth, when is the end.
sentences.chinese: 天天重複過着，瘋瘋癲癲的餬口，什麼時候纔是盡頭。

sentences.english: The prisoner faked insanity to avoid confrontation with the jailhouse bully.
sentences.chinese: 這名囚犯假裝瘋癲，避免與那個獄霸發生衝突。

sentences.english: There may have been madness in your sister-in-law's family.
sentences.chinese: 在你弟媳婦的家庭裏也許有瘋癲的遺傳因子。

sentences.english: Most of my family and friends think I am crazy.
sentences.chinese: 我的家人和朋友大都說我有點瘋癲。

sentences.english: Shakespeare's treatment of madness in "King Lear" is excellent.
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亞在《李爾王》中對瘋癲的處理手法精妙絕倫。

sentences.english: Where is the supreme madness or the genuine pleasure of evil?
sentences.chinese: 極度的瘋癲或是對罪惡真的感到快樂的人在哪兒？

sentences.english: These two aspects will print the fall to push up the crazy path.
sentences.chinese: 這兩方面將印秋推上了瘋癲的道路。

sentences.english: I freely confess I'm as dotty as you are.
sentences.chinese: 我坦白承認，我跟你一樣瘋瘋癲癲。
